values: Where I Am There Will My Servant Be: A Call to Treasure Christ TogetherWhere I Am There Will My Servant Be: A Call to Treasure Christ Together

When Jesus died, he didn’t just die before us—as an example to copy—but for us—as a sacrifice to trust in.When Jesus died, he didn’t just die before us—as an example to copy—but for us—as a sacrifice to trust in.
